plot: Joan desperately needs this first date to go well. She has the perfect outfit, the perfect make up and the perfect perfume. What could possibly go wrong?
title: How to Rock a First Date
plot_es: Joan desperately needs this first date to go well. She has the perfect outfit, the perfect make up and the perfect perfume. What could possibly go wrong?
original_name: How to Rock a First Date
plot_en: Joan desperately needs this first date to go well. She has the perfect outfit, the perfect make up and the perfect perfume. What could possibly go wrong?
